refs.AgentInfo$AcceptedByAgentTimestamp: The timestamp when the contact was accepted by the agent.
refs.AgentInfo$PreviewEndTimestamp: The timestamp when the agent finished previewing the contact.
refs.AgentInfo$ConnectedToAgentTimestamp: The timestamp when the contact was connected to the agent.
refs.AgentInfo$AfterContactWorkStartTimestamp: The date and time when the agent started doing After Contact Work for the contact, in UTC time.
refs.AgentInfo$AfterContactWorkEndTimestamp: The date and time when the agent ended After Contact Work for the contact, in UTC time. In cases when agent finishes doing AfterContactWork for chat contacts and switches their activity status to offline or equivalent without clearing the contact in CCP, discrepancies may be noticed for AfterContactWorkEndTimestamp.
refs.ChatContactMetrics$AgentFirstResponseTim: The agent first response timestamp for a chat contact.
refs.Contact$InitiationTimestamp: The date and time this contact was initiated, in UTC time. For INBOUND, this is when the contact arrived. For OUTBOUND, this is when the agent began dialing. For CALLBACK, this is when the callback contact was created. For TRANSFER and QUEUE_TRANSFER, this is when the transfer was initiated. For API, this is when the request arrived. For EXTERNAL_OUTBOUND, this is when the agent started dialing the external participant. For MONITOR, this is when the supervisor started listening to a contact.
refs.Contact$DisconnectTimestamp: The date and time that the customer endpoint disconnected from the current contact, in UTC time. In transfer scenarios, the DisconnectTimestamp of the previous contact indicates the date and time when that contact ended.
refs.Contact$LastUpdateTimestamp: The timestamp when contact was last updated.
refs.Contact$LastPausedTimestamp: The timestamp when the contact was last paused.
refs.Contact$LastResumedTimestamp: The timestamp when the contact was last resumed.
refs.Contact$RingStartTimestamp: The timestamp when ringing started for a campaign call.
refs.Contact$ScheduledTimestamp: The timestamp, in Unix epoch time format, at which to start running the inbound flow.
refs.Contact$ConnectedToSystemTimestamp: The timestamp when customer endpoint connected to Amazon Connect.
refs.ContactEvaluation$StartTimestamp: The date and time when the evaluation was started, in UTC time.
refs.ContactEvaluation$EndTimestamp: The date and time when the evaluation was submitted, in UTC time.
refs.ContactEvaluation$DeleteTimestamp: The date and time when the evaluation was deleted, in UTC time.
refs.ContactSearchSummary$InitiationTimestamp: The date and time this contact was initiated, in UTC time. For INBOUND, this is when the contact arrived. For OUTBOUND, this is when the agent began dialing. For CALLBACK, this is when the callback contact was created. For TRANSFER and QUEUE_TRANSFER, this is when the transfer was initiated. For API, this is when the request arrived. For EXTERNAL_OUTBOUND, this is when the agent started dialing the external participant. For MONITOR, this is when the supervisor started listening to a contact.
refs.ContactSearchSummary$DisconnectTimestamp: The timestamp when the customer endpoint disconnected from Amazon Connect.
refs.ContactSearchSummary$ScheduledTimestamp: The timestamp, in Unix epoch time format, at which to start running the inbound flow.
refs.ContactSearchSummaryAgentInfo$ConnectedT: The timestamp when the contact was connected to the agent.
refs.ContactSearchSummaryQueueInfo$EnqueueTim: The timestamp when the contact was added to the queue.
refs.Credentials$AccessTokenExpiration: A token generated with an expiration time for the session a user is logged in to Amazon Connect.
refs.Credentials$RefreshTokenExpiration: Renews the expiration timer for a generated token.
refs.CustomerVoiceActivity$GreetingStartTimes: Timestamp that measures the beginning of the customer greeting from an outbound voice call.
refs.CustomerVoiceActivity$GreetingEndTimesta: Timestamp that measures the end of the customer greeting from an outbound voice call.
refs.Expiry$ExpiryTimestamp: The timestamp indicating when the routing step expires.
refs.GetCurrentMetricDataResponse$DataSnapsho: The time at which the metrics were retrieved and cached for pagination.
refs.GetMetricDataRequest$StartTime:
The timestamp, in UNIX Epoch time format, at which to start the reporting interval for the retrieval of historical metrics data. The time must be specified using a multiple of 5 minutes, such as 10:05, 10:10, 10:15.

The start time cannot be earlier than 24 hours before the time of the request. Historical metrics are available only for 24 hours.
refs.GetMetricDataRequest$EndTime:
The timestamp, in UNIX Epoch time format, at which to end the reporting interval for the retrieval of historical metrics data. The time must be specified using an interval of 5 minutes, such as 11:00, 11:05, 11:10, and must be later than the start time timestamp.

The time range between the start and end time must be less than 24 hours.
refs.GetTaskTemplateResponse$LastModifiedTime: The timestamp when the task template was last modified.
refs.GetTaskTemplateResponse$CreatedTime: The timestamp when the task template was created.
refs.ParticipantMetrics$LastMessageTimestamp: Timestamp of last chat message by Participant.
refs.QueueInfo$EnqueueTimestamp: The timestamp when the contact was added to the queue.
refs.QuickConnectContactData$InitiationTimest: Timestamp when the quick connect contact was initiated.
refs.RecordingInfo$StartTimestamp: When the conversation of the last leg of the recording started in UTC time.
refs.RecordingInfo$StopTimestamp: When the conversation of the last leg of recording stopped in UTC time.
refs.RoutingCriteria$ActivationTimestamp: The timestamp indicating when the routing criteria is set to active. A routing criteria is activated when contact is transferred to a queue. ActivationTimestamp will be set on routing criteria for contacts in agent queue even though Routing criteria is never activated for contacts in agent queue.
refs.StateTransition$StateStartTimestamp: The date and time when the state started in UTC time.
refs.StateTransition$StateEndTimestamp: The date and time when the state ended in UTC time.
refs.TaskTemplateMetadata$LastModifiedTime: The timestamp when the task template was last modified.
refs.TaskTemplateMetadata$CreatedTime: The timestamp when the task template was created.
refs.UpdateTaskTemplateResponse$LastModifiedT: The timestamp when the task template was last modified.
refs.UpdateTaskTemplateResponse$CreatedTime: The timestamp when the task template was created.
